title: How to get free skins and pets in Among Us - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey if you are looking for free skins in among us read this answer You can get all the paid content for free not only skins but all pets and hats too You can also remove all the ads for free too you just have to download a mod apk from a safe site be sure to download a genuine one or you will end up wasting your data and time If you wish to know how to get all the PREMIUM contents for FREE in among us watch this video which explains all the steps in detail and in a simple manner  I am sure the video will help you : )
I don't personally know the game, but I did see that this has already been answered elsewhere: Skye Easter's answer to How do I unlock all the skins, hats, and pets in Among Us for free?
